title: Ranked Team Looking For Players
body:
Hi there,

I'm looking to create a semi-serious ranked team. By this I mean i want to be able to arrange times/dates for games in advance, and expect everyone to show up.

To maintain a reasonable skill level and ensure good games, I would prefer the whole team to be roughly of Plat skill level (it's ok if you're not quite there yet).

Voice comms are 100% necessary (Skype, Teamspeak).

Thanks for reading, leave your IGN, Rank, Main Role and age below like so or add me in game - Andy Pandyy:
IGN: Andy Pandyy
RANK: PLAT V
ROLE: JUNGLE 
Age: 17

Additionally we need people to be able to join a facebook group, to allow us to organise game times/dates.

replies.body:
ign: MeeMoo
Rank: Gold 3
Role: ADC/Support
Age: 19
(add if you want to tryout etc)

IGN::OgggaWogga
Rank: Silver 3 (was playing %%%% aka raging early on in the year but now better, climbed all the way from Bronze 4)
Role: Mid, Top
Age: 15

Silver IV in promos for Silver III, But if you op.gg me then you will see my normals averge MMR is around 1500-1600 this is around plat level and I can handle myself really well against other high ranks aswell. If you want proof add me in game and trial me. All I lack in I would day that holds me  back from plat-diamond is my map awareness. I can mid, sup or adc

IGN: Spontaious Burn
Rank: Silver IV
Role: mid/adc/supp
Age: 16
bronze 2, top, mid and jg main
yo would like to try out add me for details
